FuncDef: This command enables or disables support of the Nokia YANG modules in the SR OS NETCONF server. If the Nokia modules are disabled, then the NETCONF requests, which reference the Nokia modules, return an error, and when a NETCONF client establishes a new session, the Nokia modules are not advertised in the SR OShello. Whenmanagement-interface configuration-modeis set toclassic, attempts to access (read or write) the configuration using the Nokia configuration modules or namespace via NETCONF results in errors, even ifnokia-modulesis enabled.
